alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:04AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Seminole, east central Lake, northwestern Brevard, northern Orange and south central Volusia Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 703 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wekiwa Springs State Park, or over Apopka, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Sanford, Apopka and Altamonte Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole
